Text: Is it really possible to burn this ISO image on a DVD?
Would love to see it as a 700mb xvid ;)
can i burn it on a dvd?...how?
is it only in russia or  on english to?

This is a russian movie with english subtitles, as stated. I have kept it uncompressed for those that want the best quality. If you want to compress it to fit whatever size you want, there are many tools available, such as DVD Shrink (for a DVD-R sized movie). I'm sure someone can compress it to a 700MB CD once they have a copy. Enjoy the movie!
